Layout/CaseIndentation.description:
Description

Indentation of when in a case/(when|in)/[else/]end.
Layout/CaseIndentation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: case (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['case', 'end'] (type: list)
IndentOneStep: False (type: bool)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
